title: Biden Seeks New Aid for Ukraine as Russia Makes Slow Progress in Seizing East - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Biden Seeks New Aid for Ukraine as Russia Makes Slow Progress in Seizing East  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Biden asks for $33 billion in new aid for Ukraine  CBS Evening News
  3. OnPolitics: White House taking 'hard look' at student loan debt relief  USA TODAY
  4. President Biden is asking Congress for billions more to support Ukraine's military  News 19 WLTX
  5. White House expects other countries to step up assistance to Ukraine  Reuters.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Russiaâ€™s military is gradually taking more territory, pushing south from the city of Izyum with the apparent aim of cutting off Ukrainian forces, as President Biden sent Congress a $33 billion request to fund weapons and provide longer-term economic aid to the Kyiv government.
